packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes:
Resolved Issues:
• Accessibility: Fixed an issue where Voice Over does not read the text available in Automatic replies edit field.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where Filter by categories is greyed out when using from the Menu bar.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where Apple Handoff feature doesn't work as expected.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where auto-capitalization wasn't working in Outlook when composing an email.
• SMIME: Fixed an issue where the SMIME certificates dropdown was pulling certificates that didn't match the user's email address.
• Search: Fixed an issue where searching using "All Accounts" search scope included results from all the available profiles.

Feature Update:
• Mail: Increased the maximum duration for the Undo Send feature to 120 seconds to match the behavior with Windows Outlook. 
• Copilot: Users will now have the option to disable Copilot from the Outlook settings.
• Disallow reactions: Allows senders to prevent recipients from reacting to their emails. This greys out the reactions entry point in the reading pane, ensuring recipients cannot react to the message.
• One Drive: Available to access from the left side bar. 
• Compliance Meeting V2: Allows tenants to create meeting-only labelling.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the smiley face in the top-right of the app.
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
packages.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:

• Added support for Retina mode when using RemoteApps (see Settings > General).
• Cleaned up the RemoteApp switcher (accessed using Option + Tab when a RemoteApp is in focus).
• Improved graphics performance for non-hardware accelerated and RemoteApp sessions. 
• Optimized Cloud PC REST API usage during Mac sleep.
• Resolved unexpected disconnect errors encountered when prompting for credentials.
• Fixed issues with daylight savings and time zone redirection.
• Show an error dialog if an RDP file cannot be imported.

If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
packages.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
packages.releaseNotes:
Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. 
Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. 
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
